eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers

Class UndoHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.material.snackbar.BaseTransientBottomBar.BaseCallback<com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar>
      • com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar.Callback
        • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.UndoHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.FlexibleAdapter.OnDeleteCompleteListener

    public class UndoHelper
extends com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar.Callback
implements eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.FlexibleAdapter.OnDeleteCompleteListener
    Helper Class to simplify the Undo operation with FlexibleAdapter.
    Since:
    30/04/2016 Created in main package
    07/12/2017 Better use of OnActionListener
    17/12/2017 Moved into UI package

    • Constructor Detail

      • UndoHelper

        public UndoHelper(eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.FlexibleAdapter adapter,
                  UndoHelper.OnActionListener undoListener)
        Default constructor.

        By calling this constructor, FlexibleAdapter.setPermanentDelete(boolean) is set false automatically.

        Parameters:
        adapter - the instance of FlexibleAdapter
        undoListener - the callback for the Undo and Delete confirmation

    • Method Detail

      • withPayload

        public UndoHelper withPayload(java.lang.Object payload)
        Sets the payload to inform other linked items about the change in action.
        Parameters:
        payload - any non-null user object to notify the parent (the payload will be therefore passed to the bind method of the parent ViewHolder), pass null to not notify the parent
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained

      • withAction

        public UndoHelper withAction(int action)
        By default UndoHelper.Action.REMOVE is performed.
        Parameters:
        action - the action, one of UndoHelper.Action.REMOVE, UndoHelper.Action.UPDATE
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained

      • withActionTextColor

        public UndoHelper withActionTextColor(int color)
        Sets the text color of the action.
        Parameters:
        color - the color for the action button
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained

      • withConsecutive

        public UndoHelper withConsecutive(boolean consecutive)
        Allows to commit previous action before next consecutive Undo request.

        Default value is false (accumulate items).

        Parameters:
        consecutive - true to commit deletion at each Undo request to undo last action, false to accumulate the deleted items and Undo all in one shot.
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained

      • start

        public com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar start(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           android.view.View mainView,
                                                           @StringRes
                                                           int messageStringResId,
                                                           @StringRes
                                                           int actionStringResId,
                                                           int duration)
        As start(List, View, CharSequence, CharSequence, int) but with String resources instead of CharSequence.

      • start

        public com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar start(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           android.view.View mainView,
                                                           java.lang.CharSequence message,
                                                           java.lang.CharSequence actionText,
                                                           int duration)
        Performs the action on the specified positions and displays a SnackBar to Undo the operation. To customize the UPDATE event, please set a custom listener with withAction(int) method.

        By default the DELETE action will be performed.

        Parameters:
        positions - the position to delete or update
        mainView - the view to find a parent from
        message - the text to show. Can be formatted text
        actionText - the action text to display
        duration - How long to display the message. Either BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_SHORT or BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_LONG or any custom Integer.
        Returns:
        The SnackBar instance
        See Also:
        start(List, View, int, int, int)

      • performAction

        private void performAction()

      • onDeleteConfirmed

        public void onDeleteConfirmed(int event)
        Called when UndoTime out is over or when Filter is started or reset in order to commit deletion in the user Repository.

        Note: Must be called on user Main Thread!

        Note: This method is also invoked by FlexibleAdapter.filterItems(List) before applying the filter.

        Specified by:
        onDeleteConfirmed in interface eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.FlexibleAdapter.OnDeleteCompleteListener
        Parameters:
        event - One of the event of Snackbar.Callback

      • onDismissed

        public void onDismissed(com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar snackbar,
                        int event)
        Overrides:
